title: Looking for a partner to open a server with
selftext:
Hey guys I’ve been wanting to open my own rust mini game server for a while but I’d like to do it with the help of someone you can either be a dev or just an enthusiast as long as you are dedicated and have enough expertise with this kinda stuff I’m interested in working with you!

You might be thinking now, oh this guy wants a guy to configure his server well you’re wrong! I know how to use Linux I know how to make discord bots, websites and even custom maps!

Private message me on Reddit so we can talk more before starting the project!
